title: João Emanuel (Lima)
subtitle: Software Engineer | InfoSec | DevOps
aboutText: I work on critical systems development, focusing on secure architecture, high performance, and legacy system maintenance. I have solid experience in PHP (Hyperf, Laravel, CodeIgniter) and building open source libraries focused on productivity and integration. With international experience developing applications for clients in Europe and North America, I specialize in translating business needs into clear and objective technical requirements.

presentation.title: About Me
presentation.intro: Hello! I'm João Emanuel, a passionate Software Engineer with years of experience in developing robust and scalable solutions.
presentation.experience: I specialize in full-stack development with a strong focus on backend technologies, security, and DevOps practices. My experience spans across PHP, JavaScript/TypeScript, and modern frameworks like React, Next.js, Node.js, and Nest.js.
presentation.passion: I'm passionate about clean code, best practices, and building systems that make a real difference. I love tackling complex challenges and transforming business requirements into elegant technical solutions.
